They aren't ZIPs. they're RARs.  You use 7zip or winRAR, starting on the first one, and it will automatically go to the next and on through them all.
@hey55zeus:  If you're using Norton or McAfee, you fail.  If you're using something else, and it's flagging a virus on that file, it's something that was added in on your end, because I'm not getting a detection on either of my machines that I've used it on.
